snippet: Mandatory minimum sentences for firearm crimes are too harsh.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Maya Schenwar calls attention to the unjust nature of mandatory minimum sentencing for gun possession, which are particularly devastating for the poor and people of color; contends there is no good evidence that suggests mandatory minimum gun laws diminish violence, which both gun proponents and gun control advocates claim.
lead_paragraph: Mandatory minimum sentences for firearm crimes are too harsh.
